description: The Putin-critic later described his slow recovery in Germany from poisoning with a nerve agent.
title: Alexei Navalny: Russian activist discharged from Berlin hospital
title_page: Alexei Navalny: Russian activist discharged from Berlin hospital - BBC News
maintext: Mr Navalny's supporters initially believed that his tea had been spiked at Tomsk airport in Siberia before he caught a flight to Moscow. However, they later said that traces of the nerve agent had been found on a water bottle in the hotel room where he had been staying.
